info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Schenectady, northeastern Albany, southeastern Saratoga, southern Washington and northern Rensselaer Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Round Lake, or near Mechanicville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Cohoes, Watervliet, Colonie, Scotia, Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Latham, Guilderland, Niskayuna, Ballston Spa, Green Island, Grafton, Waterford, Cambridge and Round Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 25. Interstate 890 between exits 4b and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 2 and 7, and between exits 8A and 13N. Interstate 787 between exits 8 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
